project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project consists of: (a) construction of the third 100 MW, non-reheat, oil fired thermal generating unit at the Muara Karang plant in Jakarta; (b) physical investigation of a proposed site in West Java for the next thermal power plant, as well as engineering services for the fourth unit of 200 MW at Muara Karang; and (c) advisory services, training, and fellowships.
